trans-unit.note: Go back

trans-unit.source: A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox.
trans-unit.target: VPN yang cepat, aman, dan mudah digunakan. Dibuat oleh pembuat Firefox.

trans-unit.note: Refers to the installed version. For example: "Release Version: 1.23"
Refers to the installed version. For example: "Release Version: 1.23"
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IPv4 address.
The abbreviation for Internet Protocol. This is followed by the user’s IP address.
The abbreviation for Internet Procol version 6. This is followed by the user’s IPv6 address.
The current download speed. The speed is shown on the next line.
The current upload speed. The speed is shown on the next line.
This refers to the user’s internet connection.
Message displayed to the user when the connection is unstable or missing, asking them to check their connection.

trans-unit.source: Turn on to protect your privacy

trans-unit.note: Switches from location 1 to location 2
This refers to the user’s internet connection.
Example: "deviceName deviceDescription"

trans-unit.source: Added less than an hour ago
trans-unit.target: Ditambahkan kurang dari satu jam yang lalu

trans-unit.note: %1 is the number of hours.
%1 is the number of days. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals
Label used for accessibility on the button to remove a device. %1 is the name of the device.

trans-unit.source: You’ve reached the device limit. To turn on the VPN on this device, you’ll need to remove one.
trans-unit.target: Anda telah mencapai batas perangkat. Untuk mengaktifkan VPN di perangkat ini, Anda harus menghapus salah satu.

trans-unit.note: Bytes per second
Kilobytes per second
Megabytes per second
Gigabytes per second
Terabytes per second
Used as accessibility description for the connection info: %1 is the localized label for “Upload” or “Download”, %2 is the speed value, %3 is the localized unit. Example: “Upload: 10 Mbps”.

trans-unit.source: Please confirm you would like to remove %1.
trans-unit.note: %1 is the name of the device being removed. The name is displayed on purpose on a new line.
This is the “remove” device button.
The title for the list of cities.
“/month” stands for “per month”. %1 is replaced by the monthly cost (including currency).
%1 is replaced by the subscription duration in months. %2 is replaced by the total subscription cost.
Appears on the in-app purchase view beside a subscription plan. "%1" is replaced by the percentage amount saved when selecting that plan.
Restore a service in case of error.

trans-unit.source: Operation not allowed from current location
trans-unit.target: Operasi tidak diizinkan dari lokasi saat ini

trans-unit.note: Search bar placeholder text
Button label

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit App Permissions
trans-unit.target: VPN harus dimatikan untuk mengubah Izin Aplikasi
trans-unit.note: Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change

trans-unit.source: VPN protects all apps by default. Turn off to choose which apps Mozilla VPN should not protect.
trans-unit.target: VPN melindungi semua aplikasi secara baku. Matikan untuk memilih aplikasi mana saja yang tidak boleh dilindungi Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.note: Header for the list of apps protected by VPN

trans-unit.source: How would you describe your Mozilla VPN experience so far?
trans-unit.target: Bagaimana gambaran Anda tentang pengalaman menggunakan Mozilla VPN sejauh ini?

trans-unit.source: We’re sorry to hear you’ve had a poor experience. Please let us know how we can improve.
trans-unit.target: Kami memohon maaf Anda mendapatkan pengalaman yang kurang baik. Harap beri tahu kami bagaimana kami dapat menjadikannya lebih baik.

trans-unit.source: We’d love to know what we can do to improve Mozilla VPN. Please share any specific feedback here.
trans-unit.target: Kami ingin mengetahui apa yang dapat kami lakukan untuk menjadikan Mozilla VPN lebih baik. Bagikan umpan balik spesifik apa pun di sini.

trans-unit.source: We’re glad you’re enjoying Mozilla VPN! Please let us know how we can make your experience even better.
trans-unit.target: Kami senang Anda menikmati Mozilla VPN! Beri tahu kami bagaimana kami dapat membuat pengalaman Anda menjadi lebih baik.

trans-unit.source: When you submit feedback, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data, including your IP address, to help us improve. This data won’t be associated with your Firefox account.
trans-unit.target: Saat Anda mengirimkan umpan balik, Mozilla VPN akan mengumpulkan data teknis dan interaksi, termasuk alamat IP Anda, untuk bantu kami meningkatkannya. Data ini tidak akan dikaitkan dengan akun Firefox Anda.

trans-unit.source: We appreciate your feedback. You’re helping us improve Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Kami menghargai umpan balik Anda. Anda membantu kami tingkatkan Mozilla VPN.

trans-unit.source: We’d love to know what we can do to improve Mozilla VPN. Please share any specific feedback here.
trans-unit.target: Kami ingin mengetahui apa yang dapat kami lakukan untuk menjadikan Mozilla VPN lebih baik. Bagikan umpan balik spesifik apa pun di sini.

trans-unit.note: Title for the language switcher toggle.

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN will use the default system language.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN akan menggunakan bahasa sistem baku.
trans-unit.note: Description for the language switcher toggle when "Use system language" is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Disable to select a different language
trans-unit.target: Nonaktifkan untuk memilih bahasa yang berbeda
trans-unit.note: Tooltip for the language switcher toggle
This string is read by accessibility tools. %1 is the language name, %2 is the localized language name.

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to edit these settings
trans-unit.target: VPN harus dimatikan untuk mengubah pengaturan ini
trans-unit.note: Associated to a group of settings that require the VPN to be disconnected to change

trans-unit.source: Push the internet forward with the latest version of the Internet Protocol
trans-unit.target: Dorong internet ke depan dengan versi terbaru Internet Protocol

trans-unit.source: Access printers, streaming sticks and all other devices on your local network
trans-unit.target: Akses printer, streaming stick, dan semua perangkat lain di jaringan lokal Anda

trans-unit.source: Get notified if a guest Wi-Fi portal is blocked due to VPN connection
trans-unit.target: Dapatkan pemberitahuan jika portal Wi-Fi tamu diblokir karena sambungan VPN

trans-unit.source: Get notified if you connect to an unsecured Wi-Fi network
trans-unit.target: Dapatkan pemberitahuan jika Anda terhubung ke jaringan Wi-Fi yang tidak aman

trans-unit.source: Get notified when you successfully switched servers
trans-unit.target: Dapatkan pemberitahuan saat Anda berhasil berpindah server

trans-unit.source: Get notified when the connection status changes
trans-unit.target: Dapatkan pemberitahuan ketika status sambungan berubah

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical data to Mozilla
trans-unit.target: Izinkan Mozilla VPN mengirim data teknis ke Mozilla

trans-unit.note: Location in the systray. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.

trans-unit.source: %1 is not secure. Click here to turn on VPN and secure your device.
trans-unit.target: %1 tidak aman. Klik di sini untuk mengaktifkan VPN dan mengamankan perangkat Anda.
trans-unit.note: %1 is the Wi-Fi network name

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to requires action. Click here to turn off VPN to see the portal.
trans-unit.target: Jaringan Wi-Fi tamu yang tersambung dengan Anda memerlukan tindakan. Klik di sini untuk mematikan VPN untuk melihat portal.

trans-unit.source: The guest Wi-Fi network you’re connected to may not be secure. Click here to turn on VPN to secure your device.
trans-unit.target: Jaringan Wi-Fi tamu yang tersambung dengan Anda mungkin tidak aman. Klik di sini untuk mengaktifkan VPN untuk mengamankan perangkat Anda.

trans-unit.source: Waiting for sign in and subscription confirmation…
Unable to establish a connection at this time. We’re working hard to resolve the issue. Please try again shortly.
trans-unit.target: Gagal membuat sambungan pada saat ini. Kami bekerja keras untuk mengatasi masalah ini. Silakan coba lagi nanti.

trans-unit.source: You can quickly access Mozilla VPN from your status bar.
trans-unit.target: Anda dapat mengakses Mozilla VPN dengan cepat dari bilah status Anda.

trans-unit.source: Visit our help center to learn more about managing your subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: Kunjungi pusat bantuan kami untuk mempelajari lebih lanjut tentang mengelola langganan Anda.

trans-unit.source: We strive to provide you with choices and collect only the technical data we need to improve Mozilla VPN. Sharing this data with Mozilla is optional.
trans-unit.target: Kami berusaha memberikan Anda pilihan dan hanya mengumpulkan data teknis yang kami butuhkan untuk meningkatkan Mozilla VPN. Membagikan data ini kepada Mozilla adalah opsional.

trans-unit.source: Allow Mozilla VPN to send technical data to Mozilla?
trans-unit.target: Izinkan Mozilla VPN mengirim data teknis ke Mozilla?

trans-unit.source: Learn more about what data Mozilla collects and how it’s used.
trans-unit.target: Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang data apa yang Mozilla kumpulkan dan bagaimana penggunaannya.

trans-unit.note: Example: You have "x of y" devices in your account, where y is the limit of allowed devices.
Select the Location of the VPN server
Accessibility description for current location of the VPN server

trans-unit.source: Encrypt your traffic so that it can’t be read by your ISP or eavesdroppers.
trans-unit.target: Enkripsi lalu lintas Anda sehingga tidak dapat dibaca oleh ISP atau penyadap Anda.

trans-unit.note: The + after the number stands for “more than”. If you change the number of countries here, please update ViewSubscriptionNeeded.qml too.

trans-unit.source: Pick a server in any country you want and hide your location to throw off trackers.
trans-unit.target: Pilih server di negara mana pun yang Anda inginkan dan sembunyikan lokasi Anda untuk menghentikan pelacak.

trans-unit.source: Stream, download, and game without limits, monthly caps or ISP throttling.
trans-unit.target: Streaming, unduh, dan bermain tanpa batas, kuota bulanan, atau pembatasan dari ISP.

trans-unit.source: We are committed to not monitoring or logging your browsing or network history.
trans-unit.target: Kami berkomitmen untuk tidak memantau atau mencatat riwayat penjelajahan atau jaringan Anda.

trans-unit.note: %1 is the number of devices. Note: there is currently no support for proper plurals

trans-unit.source: Please update the app before you continue to use the VPN
trans-unit.target: Harap perbarui aplikasi sebelum Anda terus menggunakan VPN

trans-unit.source: We detected and fixed a serious bug. You must update your app.
trans-unit.target: Kami telah mendeteksi dan memperbaiki masalah serius. Anda harus memperbarui aplikasi Anda.

trans-unit.source: Your connection will not be secure while you update.
trans-unit.target: Sambungan Anda tidak akan aman saat Anda memperbarui.

trans-unit.note: This refers to the current IP address, i.e. "IP: Loading".

trans-unit.source: Mozilla VPN requires Mac OS X 10.6 or later.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN membutuhkan Mac OS X 10.6 atau lebih baru.

trans-unit.source: A previous installation of Mozilla VPN exists at /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app. This installer will remove the previous installation prior to installing. Please back up any data before proceeding.
trans-unit.target: Instalasi Mozilla VPN sebelumnya ada di /Applications/Mozilla VPN.app. Pemasang ini akan menghapus instalasi yang ada sebelum memasang. Harap cadangkan data apa pun sebelum melanjutkan.

trans-unit.source: You will now be guided through the installation steps for the Mozilla VPN. Thank you for choosing your VPN from the trusted pioneer of internet privacy.
trans-unit.target: Anda sekarang akan dipandu melalui langkah pemasangan untuk Mozilla VPN. Terima kasih telah memilih VPN Anda dari perintis privasi internet tepercaya.

trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN is successfully installed. You’re ready to start taking control of your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN berhasil dipasang. Anda siap untuk mulai mengendalikan privasi daring Anda.

trans-unit.source: The Mozilla VPN is successfully installed. Go to your Applications folder to open up the VPN and start taking control of your online privacy.
trans-unit.target: Mozilla VPN berhasil dipasang. Buka folder Aplikasi Anda untuk membuka VPN dan mulai mengendalikan privasi daring Anda.

trans-unit.note: Shown as message body in a notification. %1 and %3 are countries, %2 and %4 are cities.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Shown as message body in a notification. %1 is the country, %2 is the city.
Refers to the app - which is currently running the background and waiting

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Tidak berhasil. Coba pencarian yang berbeda

trans-unit.note: One of the answers on the feedback question about the user experience with the VPN client.

trans-unit.source: If you enjoy using Mozilla VPN, would you review it? Thanks for your support!
trans-unit.target: Jika Anda senang menggunakan Mozilla VPN, apakah Anda bersedia memberikan ulasan? Terima kasih atas dukungannya!

trans-unit.source: Show or hide the developer options menu
trans-unit.target: Tampil atau sembunyikan menu opsi pengembang

trans-unit.source: Staging services are used to test features before they go live to production
trans-unit.target: Layanan pentahapan digunakan untuk menguji fitur sebelum tayang di tahap produksi

trans-unit.source: VPN must be restarted to take effect
trans-unit.target: VPN harus dimulai ulang untuk memberikan dampak

trans-unit.note: Displayed in a notification as "call to action" when apps are missing from the split-tunnel settings.
Apps listed in the split-tunnel settings. %1 is the number of missing apps If necessary, this can be translated as "Apps missing from list :%1"

trans-unit.source: Success! You added “%1” to this list.
trans-unit.target: Berhasil! Anda menambahkan “%1” ke dalam daftar ini.
trans-unit.note: Displayed in notification after the user added a missing app to the split-tunnel List; %1 is the name of the added application

trans-unit.source: For any questions about setting app permissions, we’ve provided some helpful tips on our website.
trans-unit.target: Untuk pertanyaan terkait pengaturan izin aplikasi, kami telah menyediakan beberapa tips bermanfaatkan di situs web kami.
trans-unit.note: This displays as informational text below split tunneling settings. The link directs to a sumo article which will help certain users who are having network issues using this feature.

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN routes your traffic through two servers instead of one for extra security and privacy. This may slow down your connection.
trans-unit.target: Multi-hop VPN mengarahkan lalu lintas Anda melalui dua server, bukan satu, untuk keamanan dan privasi tambahan. Ini dapat memperlambat koneksi Anda.

trans-unit.source: Exit location represents your main VPN server.
trans-unit.target: Lokasi keluar mewakili server VPN utama Anda.

trans-unit.note: This is alt text for an arrow showing the multi-hop route between servers. e.g. Atlanta TO Copenhagen

trans-unit.source: No results. Try a different search
trans-unit.target: Tidak berhasil. Coba pencarian yang berbeda

trans-unit.source: How can we help you with Mozilla VPN?
trans-unit.target: Apa yang bisa kami bantu dengan Mozilla VPN?

trans-unit.note: A user trying to submit feedback will use this dropdown to select the general topic related to the feedback.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to payment and billing.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to account issues.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to technical issues.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to requesting new features.
A user selecting this will be submitting in-app feedback related to issues not covered under the other categories.

trans-unit.source: When you submit, Mozilla VPN will collect technical and interaction data with your email to help our support team understand your issue.
trans-unit.target: Ketika Anda kirimkan, Mozilla VPN akan mengumpulkan data teknis dan interaksi dengan surel Anda untuk membantu tim dukungan kami memahami masalah Anda.

trans-unit.source: Our support team will contact you at %1 once we’ve been able to look at your issue.
trans-unit.target: Tim dukungan kami akan menghubungi Anda ke alamat %1 setelah kami dapat mengetahui masalah Anda.
trans-unit.note: The %1 represents the email used to complete the form

trans-unit.target: Terjadi kesalahan saat mengirimkan permintaan dukungan Anda

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again.
trans-unit.target: Terjadi kesalahan tak terduga, harap coba lagi.

trans-unit.source: To continue subscribing, please sign in to your Google Account
trans-unit.target: Untuk terus berlangganan, silakan masuk ke Akun Google Anda

trans-unit.source: Your subscription is linked to another Firefox Account. You may need to sign in with a different email address.
trans-unit.target: Langganan Anda ditautkan dengan Firefox Account lainnya. Anda mungkin perlu masuk dengan alamat surel yang berbeda.

trans-unit.source: An unexpected error has occurred, please try again. Visit our help center below to learn how to troubleshoot this issue or contact support.
trans-unit.target: Terjadi kesalahan tak terduga, harap coba lagi. Kunjungi pusat bantuan kami di bawah untuk mempelajari cara memecahkan masalah ini atau hubungi dukungan.

trans-unit.source: We’ve added a ton of cool features in this latest release. Take the tour to get a deeper dive into what we’ve added for you!
trans-unit.target: Kami telah menambahkan banyak fitur keren dalam rilis terkini ini. Ikuti tur untuk mengetahui lebih dalam apa yang telah kami tambahkan untuk Anda!

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN will route your traffic through a second server for added protection. You can find this feature on the “Select location” screen.
trans-unit.target: Multi-hop VPN akan mengatur rute lalu lintas Anda melalui server kedua untuk perlindungan tambahan. Anda dapat menemukan fitur ini pada layar “Pilih lokasi”.

trans-unit.source: The in-app support form will allow you to contact support from within the VPN app. You can find it in the “Get help” section.
trans-unit.target: Formulir dukungan dalam aplikasi memungkinkan Anda menghubungi dukungan di dalam aplikasi VPN. Anda dapat menemukannya di bagian “Dapatkan bantuan”.

trans-unit.source: Custom DNS servers allow for faster speed using local networks, features like ad-blocking and anti-tracking. You can find this feature in the “Network settings” section.
trans-unit.target: Server DNS Khusus memungkinkan kecepatan lebih menggunakan jaringan lokal, menghadirkan fitur seperti pemblokiran iklan dan anti-pelacakan. Anda dapat menemukan fitur ini pada bagian “Pengaturan jaringan”.

trans-unit.source: Multi-hop VPN uses multiple VPN servers instead of one for extra security and privacy.
trans-unit.target: Multi-hop VPN menggunakan beberapa server VPN, bukan satu, untuk perlindungan dan privasi tambahan.

trans-unit.source: The in-app support form will streamline the process of getting your issues resolved.
trans-unit.target: Formulir dukungan dalam aplikasi akan memudahkan proses penyelesaian masalah Anda.

trans-unit.source: Custom DNS settings allow for faster connection using local servers.
trans-unit.target: Pengaturan DNS Khusus memungkinkan sambungan lebih cepat menggunakan server lokal.

trans-unit.source: Check out all the new features available in the latest version of Mozilla VPN!
trans-unit.target: Lihat semua fitur baru yang tersedia di versi terbaru Mozilla VPN!

trans-unit.source: VPN must be off to change these settings
trans-unit.target: VPN harus dimatikan untuk mengubah pengaturan ini
Otomatis menggunakan DNS yang dilindungi Mozilla VPN
Gunakan DNS pemblokir iklan dan anti pelacakan

trans-unit.source: Block internet ads and harmful domains with VPN
trans-unit.target: Blokir iklan internet dan domain berbahaya dengan VPN

trans-unit.source: Resolve websites using a custom DNS
trans-unit.target: Atasi situs web dengan DNS khusus

trans-unit.source: Invalid DNS, please try a new one
trans-unit.target: DNS tidak valid, silakan coba yang lainnya
Otomatis menggunakan DNS yang dilindungi Mozilla VPN

trans-unit.source: Resolve website domain names using a DNS in your local network
trans-unit.target: Selesaikan nama domain situs web dengan menggunakan DNS dalam jaringan lokal Anda

trans-unit.source: We currently support only IPv4 IP addresses
trans-unit.target: Saat ini kami hanya mendukung alamat IP berbasis IPv4

trans-unit.source: Another Firefox Account has already subscribed using this Apple ID.
trans-unit.target: Firefox Account lainnya telah berlangganan menggunakan Apple ID ini.
